Current time: Wednesday, February 18th, 2026 — 7:18 PM (America/New_York)

Return your summary as plain text; it will be delivered automatically. If the task explicitly calls for messaging a specific external recipient, note who/where it should go instead of sending it yourself.

The user wants me to run a crypto scanner task. Let me break this down:

1. PART 1 - New Launches: Call Moralis API for pump.fun new tokens, get top 5 with Token | MC | Volume
2. PART 2 - Bottom Fish: Get tokens with progress 40-70%, output Token | MC | Progress | Volume
3. Combine into one report with label 'EDUCATIONAL RESEARCH - High Risk'
4. Keep under 45 sec
